trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Santa Clarita
There were no other sightings in Santa Clarita on or around May 6th 2011
Summary: Plasma Lime Green Ball traveling slowly and meandering along at about 300 ft altitude
divs: Sighting DetailsTonight I was walking my dog along the same route I use each night, on the way back to my home I saw a Lime green plasma ball slowly meandering across the sky, I watched it very closely to see if it was possibly an aircraft light, but it did not change or blink like aircraft lights. I watched it travel in a straight line then meander in an angle left then circle around, it was about the size of a Lear Jet, because one cam by at about the same altitude 10 minutes later. This was definetly NOT a plane or helicopter as it was completely silent and iluminated in a very bright plasma green light. I watched it travel across our city for about 15 miles until it dissapeared.
